# NATA Exam Tools by Neram Classes
# https://app.neramclasses.com/tools

## About
Free NATA preparation tools to help students calculate cutoffs, predict colleges, and find exam centers.

## Available Tools

### 1. Cutoff Calculator
URL: /tools/cutoff-calculator
Purpose: Calculate your expected NATA cutoff score
Input: Section-wise scores (Mathematics, Aptitude, Drawing)
Output: Total score, percentage, performance category

### 2. College Predictor
URL: /tools/college-predictor
Purpose: Find architecture colleges matching your NATA score
Input: NATA score, Category, Preferred state
Output: List of colleges with admission chances
Database: 5000+ colleges across India

### 3. Exam Center Locator
URL: /tools/exam-centers
Purpose: Find NATA exam centers near you
Input: State, City, or use location
Output: Exam center details with directions

## Provider
Neram Classes - NATA & JEE Paper 2 Coaching
Website: https://neramclasses.com
